Package ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.controllers

Class CategoryBillController

java.lang.Object
ar.edu.utn.frc.tup.lc.iv.controllers.CategoryBillController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/categories") public class CategoryBillController extends Object
REST controller for managing category bills. This controller handles requests related to category bills, including adding new categories and retrieving existing ones.

  • Method Details

    • addCategoryBill

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CategoryBillResponseDTO> addCategoryBill(@RequestBody CategoryBillRequestDTO categoryBillDTO)
      Adds a new category bill.
      Parameters:
      categoryBillDTO - The DTO containing the category bill information.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing the created category bill response DTO.

    • getAll

      @GetMapping("page") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<CategoryBillResponseDTO>> getAll(@RequestParam(required=false) Long id, @RequestParam(required=false) Boolean isDeleted, @RequestParam(required=false) String searchTerm, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves all category bills, or filters by name if provided.
      Parameters:
      id - Optional parameter to filter categories by id.
      isDeleted - Optional parameter to filter if is deleted.
      searchTerm - name or description for filter
      pageable - pageable, size, page and sort
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of category bill response DTOs.

    • getAll

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<CategoryBillResponseDTO>> getAll(@RequestParam(required=false) Long id)
      Retrieves all category bills, or filters by name if provided.
      Parameters:
      id - Optional parameter to filter categories by id.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of category bill response DTOs.

    • updateCategoryBill

      @PutMapping("{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CategoryBillResponseDTO> updateCategoryBill(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody CategoryBillRequestDTO categoryBillDTO)
      Update a category bill.
      Parameters:
      id - of the category bill
      categoryBillDTO - The DTO containing category bill information.
      Returns:
      The response DTO for the update category bill.

    • getValidName

      @GetMapping("valid-name") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Boolean> getValidName(@RequestParam String name)
      Retrieves true if name is not repeted.
      Parameters:
      name - of the category.
      Returns:
      true if name is not repeted, false if is repeted.
